name: Ski-Ball
description:
\\\\Ski-Ball////

Use the arrow keys or SWAD to guide your skee ball down to slope to get the high score. Floating yellow boxes give you points and a speed boost, as well as a point multiplier that is reset with every ball. You have 9 balls and then the game is over. It will reset in 10 seconds and you will have another shot at success.

The only way to quit is to close the window. Thanks for playing!
